Description:
Bosch Global Software Technologies Private Limited
(CIN: U72400KA1997PTC023164) | Ozone Manay Tech Park (OMTP), 56/18, Garvebhavi Palya | Hongasandra Village | Begur Hobli, Hosur Main Road | Bengaluru-560068 | Karnataka | INDIA | www.bosch-softwaretechnologies.com·       Process Coach R&R:·       Continuous analysis and tracking of the respective project + project team status from process maturity/knowledge and ASPICE-conformance point of view·       AS Process Coach, support the projects to reach the ASPICE target goal expected by customer/internal requirement·       Support of identification of process or tool gaps·       Definition of training/coaching needs from processes and tools point of view·       Coach can support to explore the needs, support in finding the right trainings and make it visible to management·       Coach will perform trainings to the teams if feasible (on request of process captains from other regions)·       Supporting the usage of standardized process and tools solutions·       Coordination of project-specific process tailoring·       Representing project interest within EPT/PMT group·       Rollout of process changes in the project·       Support in preparation of QGs, WPAs, PCOMs, ASPICE audits and SW-/Product Releases, incl de-briefing·       Participate in Lessons Learnt meetings of the project·       Organizing, participating and supporting classroom trainings for the projects·       Participating in key project meetings (e.g. EPR, SE-Team meeting)Knowledge of what is expected from QMM (EPQ) in addition to the defined process LibrarySoftware Testing/Process definition/Process Champion/Engineering Process/Added advantage (ASPICE Provisonal Certification)B.E./B.Tech (ECE)10 years to 12 yearsJob Details
